title: Return to Zootopia: Full Fan Film
overview: In Zootopia, Judy Hopps (Creative Multitasker) and Nick Wilde (Mauricio Velazco) have spent six months as partners in the ZPD, catching criminals and being the best at what they do... but their relationship is slowly flourishing into something more than friendship. Now the duo must test their trust for one another as a new case starts to slowly spiral their lives out of control.
